Purpose: To quantify Vitamin B7 (Biotin) levels in clinical specimens for accurate assessment of patient biotin status.
Container: Red-top (no additive) or serum separator tube (SST); lithium heparin, EDTA, or heparinized vacutainer (dark green/PST)
Equipment: High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) or Mass Spectrometry system, centrifuge, vortex mixer, analytical balance, pipettes
